code: public void subscribe(EventListener<TaskEvent> listener, Class<? extends TaskEvent> eventType) {     synchronized (listeners) {         listeners.put(eventType, listener).     } }

comment: /**  * Publishes the task event to all subscribed event listeners.  *  * @param event The event to publish.  */
code: /**  * Publishes the task event to all subscribed event listeners.  *  * @param event The event to publish.  */ public void publish(TaskEvent event) {     synchronized (listeners) {         for (EventListener<TaskEvent> listener : listeners.get(event.getClass())) {             listener.onEvent(event).         }     } }
